Ruby.en: An extremely fast and powerful attack.

Sapphire.en: An extremely fast and powerful attack.

Emerald.en: An extremely fast and powerful attack.

FireRed.en: A blindingly speedy charge attack that always goes before any other.
FireRed.de: Extrem schnelle und kraftvolle Attacke, die stets zuerst trifft.

LeafGreen.en: A blindingly speedy charge attack that always goes before any other.
LeafGreen.de: Extrem schnelle und kraftvolle Attacke, die stets zuerst trifft.

Diamond.en: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.
Diamond.de: Extrem schnelle und kraftvolle Attacke, die stets zuerst trifft.
